Text:
I need to send some POST data in the form of JSON to a site, then begin to read it's response. I've done it here in Java:
http://pastebin.com/rBwtXJ5q

This returns some JSON content:
{"profiles":[{"id":"069a79f444e94726a5befca90e38aaf5","name":"Notch"}],"size":1}

How can I open a connection like shown in my Java example in Rails? It's necessary that I am able to set the headers and what not. I searched up how to do this a couple times, the results were very confusing (for me). I am new to Rails, please explain things for me. Thank you!

Thank you!
